Reviews.Content: spend 9 nights hotel spring tagging college students spring break rome clean private bathroom tv internet access didnt watch tv internet access little flakey enjoyed stay front desk attendants helpful spoke english poor italian continental breakfast morning included pastries fruit yogurt didnt eat food allergies loved little refrigerator deli bottom floor building couple grocery stores nearby

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: dournes
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel february paid 129 euros luxurious price absolutely perfect single sufficient fridge tv wifi soap etc towels changed day clean hotel quiet despite close termini strong getting rome breakfast compared 2star hotels ive tried past staff discreet efficient definitely hotel recommend friends
